```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(gganimate)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2020-09-15')
```
```{r}
kids <-tuesdata$kids
```
```{r}
kids_formatted <- kids %>%
  filter(variable == "PK12ed") %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(rank = rank(-inf_adj_perchild),
         Value_rel = inf_adj_perchild/inf_adj_perchild[rank==1],
         Value_lbl = paste0(" ",round(inf_adj_perchild/1e9))) %>%
  group_by(state) %>%
  filter(rank <=51) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
kids_plot <- kids_formatted %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = ))
```
